alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 11:47AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Moffat and north central Rio Blanco Counties through 1230 PM MDT... At 1147 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Meeker, or 40 miles southwest of Craig, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meeker around 1205 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Colorado 13 between mile markers 37 and 64. Colorado 64 between mile markers 65 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Flat Tops
